B0FKVN5R5J.product_name: Frida Mom Anesthetic Spray, Hospital Strength Benzocaine and Glycerin for Instant Relief and Healing, Dermatologist Tested, with Aloe and Witch Hazel, Postpartum Essentials, 3.5oz
B0FKVN5R5J.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Skin Care > Maternity
B0FKVN5R5J.description: Frida Mom Anesthetic Spray is expertly formulated with hospital-strength benzocaine and glycerin to deliver instant pain relief and a protective barrier for sensitive skin. Perfect for postpartum women seeking immediate comfort after childbirth, this spray is gentle enough for the area and ideal for targeted, soothing relief. Infused with calming aloe and witch hazel—without parabens, phthalates, or fragrances—this dermatologist-tested formula supports skin recovery and comfort. The unique upside-down spray design ensures easy, hygienic, and no-touch application, reaching exactly where it’s needed. Simply spray the affected area for fast-acting comfort and ongoing protection during your healing process.
features: POSTPARTUM COMFORT: Specially designed for new moms, Frida Mom Anesthetic Spray delivers targeted relief. A postpartum essential that is gentle on you while helping you speed up your postpartum recovery journey.
2-in-1 HOSPITAL STRENGTH FORMULA: Combines benzocaine and glycerin for instant, lasting relief while creating a protective barrier to support healing and comfort.
GENTLE, TARGETED APPLICATION: Innovative design allows the spray to be used upside-down, delivering a fine, no-touch mist directly to sensitive areas for soothing relief.
SOOTHING INGREDIENTS: Enriched with aloe and witch hazel, this formula calms and nourishes skin without parabens, phthalates, or added fragrances.
DERMATOLOGIST TESTED & HYGIENIC: Developed for hospital-level relief and rigorously tested for safety, offering a clean, hands-free application every time.

B0D951L465.product_name: Lansinoh Magnesium Bedtime Butter Body Lotion for Pregnant Moms, Calm Magnesium Lotion for Aching Muscles, Lotion for Women & Soothing Massage, Promote Relaxation, Help Ease Cramps, 7 oz.
B0D951L465.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Skin Care > Maternity
B0D951L465.description: Attn: pregnant mamas – say hello to your new bedtime BFF! Lansinoh’s new Calming Bedtime Butter is a rich, luxurious body butter for women, designed specifically for use during maternity and postpartum. Made with a soothing blend of magnesium cream and the calming scents of lavender and chamomile, our power-packed formula helps support a relaxing bedtime routine for better zzz's and body care! Combine this nourishing lotion with gentle massage to give your tired, achy muscles a little extra TLC. Our body butter is safe for sensitive skin and dermatologically tested, with moisturizing shea butter and cocoa butter that melts into your skin overnight, leaving skin soft and supple. Wave goodbye to restless nights and say hello to the sleep routine of your dreams! For over 40 years, new mothers have trusted Lansinoh to support and care for them while they enter the messy magic of motherhood. Born from one mother’s realization that birthing people often go without the support they need and deserve, Lansinoh proudly stands with mothers all over the world. Our journey started with award winning, doctor recommended HPA Lanolin Nipple Cream: today, we offer a comprehensive collection of solutions to help new parents navigate pregnancy, birth, breastfeeding, and pumping. Our product range includes organic nipple balm, disposable nursing pads, washable nursing pads, breastmilk storage bags, manual breast pumps and double electric breast pumps, postpartum essentials, baby bottles, and more. Lansinoh products are available in more than 70 countries and the company is committed to being climate neutral by 2030.
features: LUXURIOUS BODY BUTTER - Moisturizing shea butter and cocoa butter melt into your skin overnight, leaving skin soft and supple
SOOTHE & RELAX AT BEDTIME - Calming magnesium, shea butter, plus lavender and chamomile scents help you prepare for sleep
EXTRA TLC FOR TIRED LEGS - Pair this body lotion with gentle massage to soothe tired, aching muscles at the end of a long day

B0DSQXZN79.description: Get the spa treatment at home with Burt's Bees Essential Kit. This gift set includes five travel size products, including Deep Cleansing Cream, Softening Foot Cream, Milk and Honey Body Lotion, Hand Salve and Beeswax Lip Balm. Burt's Bees Soap Bark and Chamomile Deep Cleansing Cream softens skin while washing away impurities, excess oil and makeup. The result is healthy-looking skin that looks as cool and refreshed as you feel. Moisturize and smooth dry skin with the hand salve and body lotion, and keep your feet soft and ready for sandal season with the foot cream. The beeswax lip balm moisturizes dry lips for a full 12 hours and delivers a final hint of peppermint oil for that one-of-a-kind refreshing tingle. Formulated without parabens, phthalates, petrolatum or SLS, these products help revitalize and beautify lips and skin with clean ingredients. Burts Bees Essential Kit makes a perfect gift that's ready to give to your favorite peopleno wrapping needed.

B0D663VWFC.description:
Snail 96% Peptide Booster Serum: The famous Snail 96 Essence, but with a boost! Boost all benefits of the Snail 96 Essence with the Peptide Booster Toner.
The Real Snail Essence: Formulated with 96.3% Snail Secretion Filtrate, this essence repairs and rejuvenates the skin from dryness and aging. It improves skin vitality by reducing dullness and soothing dehydrated skin.
Skin Booster Peptide Toner Serum: Skin Boosting Toner Serum with 6 Peptides that improve skin elasticity, fine lines, pores, and radiance. Boost your skin's condition and achieve multiple benefits with this toner.
How to Use: 1. After cleansing, apply 2-3 pumps of the Peptide Booster Serum and gently pat to aid absorption. 2. Apply 2-3 pumps of the Snail 96 Essence. 3. Finish up with your favorite mosturizer if needed.
Patch Test Recommended: Perform a Patch Test on the body before using on the face. Proceed to using on the face if no irritation occurs in 24 hours. Consult with your doctor immediately if irritation occurs.

B0CG9ZY4QC.product_name: O'Keeffe's Giftbox Including Lip Repair with Cherry and Vitamin E Oil Stick, Working Hands Jar and Healthy Feet Jar, Gift Idea
B0CG9ZY4QC.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Skin Care > Sets & Kits
B0CG9ZY4QC.description:
For over 25 years, O'Keeffe's hardworking skincare products have been providing guaranteed relief. This gift set contains three essential products:
O’Keeffe’s Working Hands Hand Cream is a concentrated, unscented hand cream that heals, relieves and repairs extremely dry, cracked hands. When used daily, O’Keeffe’s Working Hands Hand Cream is clinically proven to instantly boost moisture levels, help prevent further moisture loss, create a protective barrier on the skin’s surface, and make a difference you will feel within days.
Directions: Start with a small amount; it's all you need. Over-application can lead to stickiness. Apply to hands as needed. Mild stinging of severely dry skin is normal, but discontinue use if it persists.
O'Keeffe's for Healthy Feet Foot Cream is a concentrated moisturizer that heals, relieves, and repairs extremely dry, cracked feet. The #1 Foot Cream Brand in America* offers dry cracked feet treatment and dry cracked heel treatment. This concentrated foot cream creates a protective layer that instantly boosts moisture levels and helps prevent moisture loss which helps lead to soft feet. When used daily it is clinically proven to improve moisture levels.
Directions: Start by applying only a small amount of O'Keeffe's foot cream to dry feet to start and add more as needed. It is unscented and non-greasy and safe for diabetics' skin.
features: Giftbox includes: (1) Working Hands Hand Cream 3.4 ounce Jar, (1) Healthy Feet Foot Cream 3.2 ounce Jar, (1) Lip Repair Lip Balm with Cherry and Vitamin E Oil

Dry Hand Repair Cream: O’Keeffe’s Working Hands Hand Cream is a concentrated hand cream that heals, relieves, soothes and repairs extremely dry, cracked hands. Creates a protective layer on the skin's surface that locks in moisture and keeps your skin hydrated.

Heals Cracked and Dry Feet: O’Keeffe’s for Healthy Feet Foot Cream is a concentrated foot cream that heals, relieves and repairs. Creates a protective layer on the skin’s surface that instantly boosts moisture levels and helps prevent further moisture loss for foot care and health.

Relieves and Repairs Dry Cracked Lips: O'Keeffe's Lip Repair with Cherry & Vitamin E oil heals, relieves and repairs extremely dry cracked lips. Creates a flexible barrier that moves with your lips to help keep dry, cracked lips protected.
Works Fast: Most people start seeing improvements in their dry cracked skin in only a few days. O'Keeffe's skin care offers guaranteed relief.

B00F97FHAW.description: Developed with dermatologists, CeraVe AM Facial Moisturizing Lotion with Sunscreen moisturizes throughout the day and helps to restore the protective skin barrier. This sunscreen lotion is Formulated with broad spectrum SPF 30 sunscreen for daily UV protection, protecting your skin from damaging UVA and UVB rays. This non-comedogenic moisturizer with SPF 30 spreads easily without leaving a chalky residue. •Suitable for all skin types •Oil-free •Non-comedogenic •Fragrance-free •Gentle, non-irritating formula •Recommended by The Skin Cancer Foundation Key Ingredients: •InVisibleZinc Technology: Provides Broad Spectrum SPF 30 sunscreen •MVE Technology: This patented delivery system continually releases moisturizing ingredients for 24-hour hydration •Ceramides: Essential for healthy skin, ceramides help restore and maintain the skin’s natural barrier •Hyaluronic Acid: This ingredient attracts hydration to the skin’s surface and helps the skin retain moisture •Niacinamide: Helps calm the skin
features: [ BROAD SPECTRUM SPF 30 ] A micro-fine zinc oxide sunscreen for UVA/UVB protection. This CeraVe moisturizer with SPF is a hydrating facial lotion that spreads easily, is absorbed quickly, and leaves a non-greasy finish

[ OIL FREE DAY CREAM ] Use this daily face sunscreen as the last step in a morning skincare routine. If layering with an eye cream, moisturizer or facial serum, apply Cerave AM facial lotion after other product applications have been fully absorbed
[ SUNSCREEN WITH NIACINAMIDE ] Contains Hyaluronic Acid to retain skin's moisture and Niacinamide to help calm skin. MVE Technology delivers hydration throughout the day

[ ESSENTIAL CERAMIDES ] Ceramides are found naturally in the skin and make up 50% of the lipids in the skin barrier. All CeraVe products are formulated with three essential ceramides (1, 3, 6-II) to help restore and maintain the skin’s natural barrier

[ GENTLE ON SKIN ] Recommended for daily use by the Skin Cancer Foundation. Fragrance free, oil free, non-comedogenic, paraben-free. Suitable for dry skin, sensitive skin, oily skin, and acne-prone skin

B005IHT94S.product_name: Neutrogena Ultra Sheer Dry-Touch Sunscreen Lotion SPF 70, Broad Spectrum, Water Resistant 80 Min, Oil-Free, Oxybenzone-Free, Non-Comedogenic, Matte Finish, Body Sunscreen, Travel Size 3 Fl Oz
B005IHT94S.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Skin Care > Sunscreens & Tanning Products > Sunscreens > Body Sunscreens
B005IHT94S.description: Neutrogena Ultra Sheer Dry-Touch Sunscreen Lotion SPF 70 is a high-performance body sunscreen lotion designed for powerful, broad spectrum sun protection on the go. Formulated with advanced Helioplex technology, this lightweight, oil-free sunscreen helps shield your skin from both aging UVA and burning UVB rays. Key Benefits: - Broad spectrum SPF 70 sunscreen lotion for daily and outdoor use - Lightweight, dry-touch formula absorbs quickly for a comfortable, non-greasy feel - Water resistant sunscreen (up to 80 minutes) for sports, travel, and outdoor activities - Oxybenzone-free and Hawaii Act 104 compliant - Oil-free, non-comedogenic, and PABA-free—won't clog pores or leave a heavy residue - TSA-approved travel size sunscreen (3 fl oz) that fits easily in bags and carry-ons - Enriched with antioxidant Vitamin E to help defend against environmental stressors - from a dermatologist recommended brand, this body sunscreen is for reliable everyday protection. Use For: - Daily sun protection for body - Outdoor activities: hiking, gardening, biking, boating, beach days, and more - Travel and on-the-go sun care, including commutes and weekend trips Technical Details: - Broad spectrum SPF 70 (UVA/UVB protection) - Helioplex technology for stabilized sun protection - Water resistant (up to 80 minutes) - Oilfree, non-comedogenic, PABA-free, oxybenzone-free - Dermatologist recommended brand - TSAapproved 3 fl oz travel size Important Note: Some users, especially those with medium to dark skin tones, may notice a white cast or slight sheen. For best results, apply evenly and reapply after swimming or sweating. A mild scent may be present but typically fades quickly. If product separates, shake well before use. Disclaimer: Not a mineral sunscreen. For external use only. If irritation occurs, discontinue use.
features: SPF 70 broad spectrum sunscreen lotion delivers high UVA/UVB protection for daily use; water resistant for up to 80 minutes to help guard skin during outdoor activities. Apply 15 minutes before sun exposure and reapply as directed.

Lightweight, oil-free, non-comedogenic Dry-Touch formula absorbs quickly for most users, leaving an ultra-light feel. Finish may vary; some may notice a slight sheen or visible white cast, especially on medium to dark skin tones.

Oxybenzone-free, Hawaii Act 104 compliant, PABA-free body sunscreen; powered by Helioplex technology to provide stable protection against aging UVA and burning UVB rays while helping defend skin from environmental stressors.

Convenient 3 fl oz travel size is TSA compliant and easy to pack in carry-ons, gym bags, or backpacks; a portable sunscreen lotion for on-the-go protection at the beach, park, or commute without weighing down your routine.

Trusted by dermatologists, this formula includes antioxidant Vitamin E for added defense. For best results, reapply at least every 2 hours and after 80 minutes of swimming or sweating; a minority may experience irritation—patch test if unsure.

B084ZP848Y.product_name: Blue Lizard Sensitive Mineral SPF 50 Sunscreen Lotion, 100% Mineral Sunscreen, UVA/UVB Protection, Infused with organic Aloe Vera, Soothes and Hydrates, 5 fl oz | with Zinc Oxide, 50+, Water Resistant, UVAUVB Protection, Sensitve
B084ZP848Y.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Skin Care > Sunscreens & Tanning Products > Sunscreens > Body Sunscreens
B084ZP848Y.description: Help keep your sensitive skin safe from the sun with Blue Lizard Sensitive Mineral SPF 50 Sunscreen Lotion. This mineral sunscreen with Zinc Oxide and Titanium Dioxide is free from harsh chemical active ingredients that might irritate sensitive skin while protecting it from 98% of UVB rays. Ideal for beach days, sporting events, or everyday sun protection, the water-resistant formula will help keep your skin protected for up to 80 minutes. Developed specifically for sensitive skin, the hypoallergenic formula is infused with soothing Aloe Vera and free from parabens, phthalates and fragrances. How to Use: Shake well prior to use. Apply liberally to dry skin 15 minutes before sun exposure. Reapply: after 80 minutes of swimming or sweating, immediately after towel drying, or at least every 2 hours. For topical use only. Keep out of reach of children. For children under 6 months of age: Ask a doctor. Sun protection measures: Spending time in the sun increases your risk of skin cancer and early skin aging. To decrease this risk, regularly use a sunscreen with a broad spectrum SPF value of 15 or higher and other sun protection measures including: Limit time in the sun, especially from 10 a.m. to 2 p.m. Wear long-sleeved shirts, pants, hats and sunglasses. Protect the product in the container from excessive heat and direct sun. Product may stain some fabrics. We ♥ the Reef: This product is made without Oxybenzone or Octinoxate to help protect fragile reef ecosystems. Featuring our Smart Cap® Technology, the cap changes color in harmful UV light so you know when to apply sunscreen. Dermatologists have trusted Blue Lizard Australian Sunscreen for over 20 years
features: POWERFUL MINERAL SUNSCREEN - Protect sensitive skin from the sun’s harmful rays with Blue Lizard Sensitive Mineral SPF 50 Sunscreen Lotion it contains no harsh chemical active ingredients that might irritate sensitive skin.
SPF 50 BROAD SPECTRUM PROTECTION - The water-resistant formula provides broad spectrum protection and helps protect skin from up to 98% of UVB rays.
FORMULATED FOR SENSITIVE SKIN - Developed specifically for sensitive skin, the hypoallergenic formula is also paraben-free and fragrance-free.
INFUSED WITH ORGANIC ALOE VERA - gently soothes and moisturizes.

B00AEN4QZ8.product_name: Neutrogena Sunscreen Lotion Beach Defense SPF 70, Face & Body Sunscreen, Broad Spectrum, Fast Absorbing, 6.7 Fl Oz, Water Resistant 80 Min, Oil-Free, Oxybenzone & Octinoxate Free
B00AEN4QZ8.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Skin Care > Sunscreens & Tanning Products > Sunscreens > Body Sunscreens
B00AEN4QZ8.description:
Neutrogena Beach Defense sunscreen lotion SPF 70 is a broad spectrum, water resistant, oil free sunscreen designed for face and body sun protection. This dermatologist recommended sunscreen lotion is oxybenzone free, octinoxate free, PABA free, and Hawaii Act 104 compliant, making it a trusted choice for families, athletes, and outdoor enthusiasts. The fast absorbing, lightweight formula with Helioplex Technology helps protect skin from UVA and UVB rays that cause sunburn and early skin aging. Suitable for all ages, including as a kids sunscreen, this body sunscreen is ideal for beach days, sports, hiking, backyard barbecues, and daily routines. Each 6.7 fl oz bottle is easy to pack with your beach essentials or gym gear. When used as directed with other sun safety measures, this sunscreen spf 70 may help decrease the risk of skin cancer and early skin aging caused by sun exposure. Apply generously before sun exposure and reapply after 80 minutes of swimming or sweating to maintain optimal protection. Neutrogena Beach Defense sunscreen lotion is formulated for all skin types, including sensitive skin, and is a versatile addition to your beach essentials, travel bag, or daily routine. Its non-greasy, fast-absorbing texture ensures comfortable wear for both face and body, making it suitable for women, men, and children. This sunscreen is also an excellent choice for those seeking a sunscreen that meets Hawaii Act 104 requirements, offering peace of mind for environmentally conscious consumers. Whether you are enjoying a day at the beach, playing sports, or simply spending time outdoors, Neutrogena Beach Defense sunscreen lotion SPF 70 provides reliable, high-performance sun protection. For best results, follow label instructions and reapply as needed to keep your skin healthy and protected under the sun.
By Neutrogena

B077TQR6ZW.description:
Developed with dermatologists, CeraVe Ultra-Light Moisturizing Lotion with SPF 30 moisturizes with a matte finish & helps repair the protective skin barrier. It contains 3 essential ceramides to repair and restore the protective skin barrier. With a lightweight feel, this facial moisturizer absorbs quickly into the skin. Can be worn alone or under makeup.
Key Ingredients:
features: [ MOISTURIZER WITH SUNSCREEN ] A non-greasy sunscreen without white-cast and ultra-light moisturizer for face that hydrates and leaves the skin with a matte finish.

[ SUNSCREEN LOTION ] Use this SPF 30 moisturizer as the last step in a morning skin care routine. If layering with an eye cream, moisturizer or facial serum, apply Cerave Ultra-Light Facial Moisturizing Lotion after other products have been fully absorbed.

[ DAILY FACE SUNSCREEN ] Broad Spectrum SPF 30 helps protect skin from UVA/UVB rays. In addition to other sun protection measures, Dermatologists recommend using daily sunscreen with at least SPF 30 to help decrease risk of skin cancer caused by the sun

[ 3 ESSENTIAL CERAMIDES ] Ceramides are found naturally in the skin and make up 50% of the lipids in the skin barrier. All CeraVe products are formulated with three essential ceramides (1, 3, 6-II) to help restore and maintain the skin’s natural barrier
[ DEVELOPED WITH DERMATOLOGISTS ] Oil free, Fragrance free, paraben-free, allergy-tested and non-comedogenic sunscreen recommended for daily use by the Skin Cancer Foundation.

It contains broad spectrum SPF 25 UVA/UVB sunscreen boosted with a complex of purified hyaluronic acid, a hydrator found naturally in the skin that binds to water and holds it in. The lightweight, non-comedogenic, alcohol-, and oil-free formula can be applied alone or under makeup, making Neutrogena Hydro Boost City Shield Water Gel SPF 25 the perfect addition to your daily skincare routine. Designed with the Earth in mind. We've removed the window and plastic tray from this carton for easier recycling.

B09QFDL2SN.product_name: Tanologist Self-Tan Drops- Medium, Bronzing Serum, Customizable Face & Body Self Tanner For Moisturizer, Gradual Tanning Drops for Natural Glow, Streak-Free Vegan Formula, 1.01 fl oz

B09QFDL2SN.description: The Tanologist Self Tan Drops were created for both the face and body to provide a streak-free, natural looking tan. Our customizable formula is perfect for both new and experienced tanners, allowing you to control the level of tan you desire with every drop. These concentrated face tanning drops need to be added to your moisturizer for easy application. Infused with skincare ingredients like pink grapefruit, goji berry and juniper, these self-tanner drops help to soften and hydrate the skin. Our face and body tanning drops put you in control with the amount of drops you add – the more drops you use, the deeper the tan. Start by adding 3-4 drops to your favorite moisturizer. Increase usage until desired tan is achieved. Dermatologist tested and non-comedogenic, these self-tanning drops are suitable for all skin types and tones. At Tanologist we believe in the universal power of glow, so we created clear, game changing, dermatologist approved self-tan innovations that are affordable and allow consumers to create their glow, in their shade, their way. Available in four customizable shades and a range of formats powered by skin-loving, derm approved formulas, Tanologist is guaranteed to work for all skin types and tones.
features: Customizable self tan drops – Mix 3–4 bronzing drops with your favorite moisturizer for a buildable face and body tan that creates a natural, sun-kissed glow
Streak-free, transfer-resistant color – Delivers even, long-lasting coverage without patches or the typical self-tanner smell for a fresh, radiant finish every time
Gradual tanning serum formula – Concentrated self tanner drops develop in 4 hours and can be layered for a deeper, bronzed look without orange tones
Safe skincare ingredients – Infused with pink grapefruit, goji berry and juniper to hydrate skin; dermatologist tested, vegan and cruelty-free
Face and body self tanner – Lightweight, non-comedogenic formula suits all skin types and tones for customizable, streak-free results that fade evenly over time

B000S2LT9Q.description:
CHAPPED LIP TREATMENT: Specially formulated for all types of chapped lips. Cortibalm helps heal mild to severe chapped lips due to harsh weather, allergies, cold sores, cosmetics, medications, (Accutane and Chemotherapy) eczema, lip licking, mouth breathing and more.
REPAIR & NOURISH LIPS: This treatment contains 1% hydrocortisone which interrupts the inflammatory cycle, stops the pain and allows the natural healing process to begin.
ORIGINAL LIP CARE PRODUCTS: Cortibalm is a mild hypoallergenic blend free of harsh chemicals, additives, flavors and colorings. These ingredients found in ordinary lip balms often irritate and prevent healing.
ECONOMICAL USE: Highly effective! Within 24 hours of application you will see and feel the results that other lip balms failed to deliver. Once healed use Dr. Dan's All Natural Lip Balm!
DISCOVER CORTIBALM: Dr. Dan's lip care is a simple blend of beeswax, petroleum jelly, mineral oil and 1 % hydrocortisone. Less is more!

B07NJJZK3W.product_name: Swiss Arabian Layali Rouge - Luxury Products From Dubai - Long Lasting Personal Perfume Oil Fragrance - A Seductive Signature Aroma - 0.5 Oz
B07NJJZK3W.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Fragrance > Women's > Eau de Parfum
B07NJJZK3W.description: Layali Rouge has all the fun and frolics of a cocktail. Opening with sweet and juicy mango, pineapple, lemon, papaya and florals, the tropical opening sets the tone for the fabulous night ahead. The fruity notes are soon joined by a burst of hypnotic roses and juicy peaches, before hibiscus and coconut catch the breeze and bring it all to a rich night time finale. Niche perfumery is a state of mind. Its perfumes circumvent the laws imposed by marketing and fall outside of the traditional commercial channels. Artisan fragrances are not developed based on a marketing study conducted by commercial brands, but originate from the imagination and artistic sensibility of a perfumer. Enjoy our wonderfully unique, luxury personal fragrances, made with only the highest quality ingredients. At Swiss Arabian, our expertise and passion, our knowledge of legendary Arabian perfumery, oriental craftsmanship and contemporary elegance, all come together to create fragrances that capture your imagination and celebrate your true essence. The history of Swiss Arabian is an enchanting tale that spans over 40 years. This pioneer in Arabian perfumes was founded in the year 1974 by a visionary with a wealth of knowledge and a deep passion for perfumery. Today, Swiss Arabian is the first perfume manufacturer in the UAE. We operate five modern manufacturing facilities spread across an area of 165,000 sq. ft., producing more than 35 million perfumes annually and export to over 80 countries.
features: LAYALI ROUGE: YOUR NEW SIGNATURE SCENT. Opens with finest notes of Papaya and uplifting Lemon. The beating heart of the fragrance brings out the deep resonance of Peach and Rose. Coconut and Hibiscus add depth to the aroma and inspire attention.

INTENSELY CONCENTRATED PERSONAL AROMAS. A more traditional approach to perfumery from the Middle East. Experience our exquisite and exclusive range of handmade perfume oils in traditional attar style. For an intense and long lasting aroma projection.

PURE QUALITY, ALCOHOL FREE FORMULATION. Perfect for sensitive skin types, our alcohol-free perfume oils are hypoallergenic and won't irritate skin. These all natural, hand crafted oils are safe for all and feature expertly curated fragrance notes.

THE PERFECT MIX OF CULTURES AND PERFUMES. Carrying a legacy rooted in a blend of Western & Oriental craftsmanship, Swiss Arabian is a brand founded on duality that proudly celebrates the space in which two seemingly opposite worlds come together.

AN AROMATIC EXPERIENCE FROM ACROSS THE SEAS. Born from precious beginnings and built on achievements aplenty, our exquisite creations will lead you on an aromatic journey of the senses that culminates in an impeccable moment that enchants forever.

B072KXYGT2.product_name: Pacifica Island Vanilla Hair Mist Perfume and Full Body Spray for Women - Fragrance Spray for A Mood-Lifting Experience, Paraben-Free, Clean Beauty No Alcohol, Vegan & Cruelty-Free, 6 oz oz
B072KXYGT2.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Fragrance > Women's > Body Sprays
B072KXYGT2.description: Warm, Sweet & Clean Vanilla Bliss: Escape to a tropical island with every spray of Pacifica Island Vanilla Hair & Body Mist. This perfume mist envelops you in the comforting warmth of Tahitian vanilla bean, topped with a hint of jasmine and creamy sandalwood. Its delicious gourmand sweetness is balanced by subtle floral and earthy notes, creating a cozy, mood-lifting fragrance experience from head to toe. Hair & Body Perfume in One: Why choose between hair perfume and body spray when you can have both? This versatile mist is specifically formulated to be used all over – mist it in your hair for a gentle fragrance that lasts, and spritz on your wrists, neck, or anywhere on your skin for an all-day vanilla glow. The alcohol-free formula means it won’t dry out your hair or skin, making it perfect for daily use as your go-to signature scent. Long-Lasting Comfort Fragrance: Indulge in a scent that’s light enough for work or school, yet cozy and inviting for a night in. Pacifica’s Island Vanilla is a long-lasting vanilla mist that you can wear alone or layer with other perfumes and lotions for extra longevity. Spray it on your hair to enhance the scent’s staying power – the natural oils in your hair help the sweet vanilla aroma linger even longer. Whether you’re freshening up post-workout or starting your day, this mist’s warm, sweet aura will draw compliments without ever being overpowering. Clean, Vegan Ingredients: Feel good knowing this fragrance is made with care. Pacifica uses natural and essential oils to create our true-to-life scents. Island Vanilla Hair & Body Mist is 100% vegan and cruelty-free, and contains no parabens, phthalates, or sulfates. It’s a clean beauty pick that lets you enjoy a luxurious scent without guilt or irritation – perfect for those with sensitive skin or anyone prioritizing clean ingredients. Fragrance Notes: • Top: Lily of the valley, Lime blossom, Vanilla • Heart: Jasmine, Vanilla orchid • Base: Vanilla bean, Sugared cocoa, Vetiver, Sandalwood Discover Your Signature Vanilla: Whether you’re a longtime vanilla lover or just starting to explore gourmand scents, Pacifica Island Vanilla is an accessible little luxury for everyday wear. Its warm and sweet profile is comforting in cooler weather, yet uplifting and wearable any time of year. Embrace the “vanilla girl” trend with this multi-use mist that leaves you feeling cozy, confident, and irresistibly scented all day long.
features: Indulgent Island Vanilla Fragrance: Experience a deliciously warm, sweet gourmand vanilla aroma with hints of jasmine, vanilla orchid, sandalwood, and vetiver. This cozy, Tahitian vanilla–inspired scent has a touch of sugared cacao, wrapping you in a comforting, long-lasting vanilla embrace all day. A must-have indulgence for vanilla fragrance lovers seeking an exotic, cozy perfume.

2-in-1 Hair & Body Mist (Alcohol-Free): Enjoy a lightweight, alcohol-free mist designed for use on both hair and body. Spray it from head to toe – it gently scents your hair without drying and refreshes your skin with a delicate vanilla perfume mist. This versatile hair perfume & body spray is perfect for everyday wear, adding a sweet, warm scent to your routine without overpowering.

Long-Lasting, Layerable Scent: Long lasting for a mist, this vanilla body spray leaves a lingering scent that you can layer with other fragrances or lotions. Mist it on your hair to carry the cozy aroma with you all day – hair perfume application helps the scent last even longer. It’s a sweet vanilla mist that’s strong enough to garner compliments yet light enough for all-day wear, making it great for work, school, or a post-gym refresh.

Clean, Vegan Beauty: Crafted with natural and essential oils for a true-to-nature scent. Our formula is 100% vegan and cruelty-free, and we never use any harsh chemicals. This clean fragrance mist is phthalate-free, paraben-free, and sulfate-free, so you can spritz freely. Pacifica is a leader in clean beauty, so you can trust you’re misting on a safe, skin-friendly fragrance.

Everyday Comfort & Versatility: Embrace a cozy fragrance that fits any occasion. This warm vanilla mist is a hit among those who love comforting scents – from teenagers exploring sweet perfumes to adults chasing a nostalgic, gourmand perfume vibe. Use it as an everyday signature scent, for a confidence boost before a date, or to relax at home in your PJs. It’s the perfect accessory for the trending “vanilla girl” aesthetic, enveloping you in a warm, inviting aura wherever you go.

B0FG1QCM2B.product_name: Lattafa Habik – Spicy, Aromatic, Woody, Musky – Eau de Parfum Spray Long-Lasting Fragrance for Men, 3.4 Ounce / 100 ml

B0FG1QCM2B.description: Lattafa Habik Eau de Parfum for Men is a bold and captivating fragrance that exudes strength and sophistication. It opens with a dynamic blend of cardamom, pepper, artemisia, and bergamot—creating a spicy-citrus introduction that is both fresh and invigorating. The heart unfolds with aromatic sage, soothing lavender, and a warm touch of cinnamon, adding depth and complexity. As the scent settles, a rich base of sandalwood, patchouli, tonka bean, amberwood, and musk delivers a smooth, earthy warmth that lingers elegantly. Perfect for the modern man, Habik is a powerful yet refined scent, ideal for both day and evening wear.
features: Bold & Charismatic Aromatic Fragrance: A refined fusion of spice, herbs, and woods that defines modern masculinity with depth and intensity

Fragrance Notes: Opens with Cardamom, Pepper, Artemisia, and Bergamot; evolves into heart notes of Sage, Lavender, and Cinnamon; settles into a warm base of Sandalwood, Patchouli, Tonka Bean, Amberwood, and Musk
Long-Lasting & Confident Wear: Perfect for evening occasions, cooler seasons, or anytime you want to leave a strong and sophisticated impression

B0D5TQJXRN.description:
💎PACKAGE CONTENT -- The package includes 1 box with 24 grids, featuring a variety of colors, approx. 32000 pcs of 3mm bling-out resin rhinestones (Mixed-Color). 1 tweezers and 1 pickup pen are included for easily picking up of rhinestones. 3 B7000 adhesive jewels glue for jewelry making. The large amount will support you to fulfill a number of your wonderful DIY decoration ideas.
💎VIBRANT GEMS FOR CRAFTS -- Made of choice resin, these crystals are lightweight, durable, and economical. The AB coating is firmly combined on the outer surface of each rhinestone, which can have different color performances under different light or different refraction angles, providing long-lasting sparkle. Their perfect cutting facets, delicate and exquisite shine will make your handicrafts more dazzling and eye-catching.
💎B7000 CLEAR GLUE FOR GEMS -- Our B7000 glue has strong adhesion and dries clear, non-toxic and harmless to the skin.The glue has a precision needle for easy application, initial cure time is 3-5 minutes and full cure time is 24 hours. The glue will have a slight overflow when first used, before use you can leave the glue head up for a few minutes to avoid overflow. After use, the needle needs to be wiped with an alcohol pad.
💎WIDE APPLICATION -- These sparkling iridescent resin rhinestones are perfect for creating dazzling looks. Use them for bedazzling crafts or nail art and more. Apply it to what you want to bling!
💎HIGHLIGHTS -- Our store also offers a variety of colors and sizes of resin rhinestones, these colors will give your crafts more possiblities, more shiny color scheme. A sufficient amount of resin gems are suitable for paving large area designs such as diamond paintings or cups. By choosing resin rhinestones with similar or contrasting colors, you can create color-coordinated or highly contrasting works, such as phone cases with gradient effect or colourful festival decorations.

B00IUY6IXQ.description: Discover the power of TRESemmé Extra Hold Hairspray, designed to finish any style with 24H hold and frizz control. Our professional-quality formula is designed to lock in moisture & lock out frizz without stickiness or crunch. To achieve the best results, apply TRESemmé Protecting Heat Styling Spray to damp hair for breakage and heat protection up to 450 degrees so you can heat style with confidence. Lock in your style and moisture with our Extra Hold Hairspray, providing all-day hold and frizz control. For over 70 years, TRESemmé has been committed to democratizing salon trends, making salon-quality products accessible to everyone, every day making it America's #1 Hairspray brand. You can count on TRESemmé for trend-inspired, professional-grade products designed to maximize ooh la la in the everyday. So as you navigate your styling journey, we’ll be here to help you style your hair (and life) your way.
features: INSTANT FRIZZ PROTECTION: In just one spray, TRESemmé Extra Hold Hairspray protects against humidity and frizz. This hairspray instantly locks out frizz to provide all-day frizz control
EXTRA HOLD HAIRSPRAY: TRESemmé Extra Hold Hairspray provides a salon-style finish and 24-hour hold for your hairstyle without crunch or stiffness
FORMULATION: From the #1 Hairspray brand, every ingredient is carefully selected to ensure your hair receives the best possible care. Our hair care products are Certified Cruelty-Free by PETA
NEW LOOK, SAME PROFESSIONAL QUALITY: For a limited time, you may receive products with our new or previous packaging design
REGIMEN USE: Apply TRESemmé Protecting Heat Styling Spray to damp hair for heat and breakage protection before heat styling and finish your style with Extra Hold Hairspray for all-day hold

B0CXLYHYHN.product_name: BASED Hair Texturizing Powder, Lightweight & Volumizing Hair Styling Powder with Matte Finish, Add Texture to Hair with Medium Hold, For Short to Medium Hair, (1.69oz Bottle, 2.5 Gram Fill, Pack of 1)
B0CXLYHYHN.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Hair Care > Styling Products > Root Lifting Powders
B0CXLYHYHN.description:
LIGHTWEIGHT TEXTURE POWDER: Unlike heavy gels or pastes, our Texture Powder is lightweight, volumizing and easy to apply. We formulated our powder to instantly add volume with a clean matte finish by absorbing any excess oil.
SHORT TO MEDIUM HAIR TYPE: To provide proper hold and volume, our texture powder is best for hair under 6 inches in length.
HOW TO USE: With your hand at least 2 inches from your head, apply 3-4 pumps of powder to dry hair. Use your fingers to evenly distribute the powder throughout your hair. If you need more hold, add some more product.
CONVENIENT SPRAY BOTTLE DESIGN: The spray bottle design allows you to get a consistent amount of powder every time. Simply take off the cap, pump, and style. No more making messes with shaker bottles.
QUALITY INGREDIENTS: Our Hair Texturizing Powder is 100% vegan and cruelty free. Made in The United States with no Sulfates, Parabens, or Phthalates. We only use 5 ingredients: Silica Silylate, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Starch, Silica, Mica, & Maranta Arundinacea Root Extract so you know exactly what you’re putting in your hair.

B0DCX7628T.product_name: Raw Batana Oil for Hair Growth - 100% Pure, Organic 4oz Batana from Honduras for Thick and Strong Natural Hair - Dr. Sebi Unrefined Cold Pressed Cosmetic Scalp Mask Gifts for Women (1 Pack)

B0DCX7628T.description:
Transform Your Hair: Our batana oil is crafted using 100% pure, organic ingredients, and handled with care by the Miskito people of Honduras. We use a traditional cold press method to naturally enhance the beauty and health of your hair.
Achieve Your Dream Hair: Recommended by renowned herbalist Dr Sebi, our cold-pressed natural oil promotes hair growth and turns dull, dry hair into thick, shiny strands. Our hair growth oil is ideal for those looking to reverse hair thinning and fill in patchy areas.
Hair Nourishment: Our hair growth oil strengthens follicles, enhances shine, while combating dryness, frizz and split ends. Enriched with nutrients this hair mask nourishes and repairs while promoting strong, vibrant hair growth.
Scalp Rejuvenation: Say goodbye to dry hair with our raw batana oils deep moisturizing properties! This hair mask infuses your scalp with nutrients, delivering everlasting softness and shine. This means your hair is not just growing but glowing!
Easy Application: Massage a generous amount of batana oil into your scalp for 3-5 minutes, leave it on for 20 minutes, then rinse. For the best results, use daily to repair, strengthen, and protect your hair. Enjoy the earthy aroma and watch your hair transform!

B0012BNVE8.product_name: Men’s Rogaine 5% Minoxidil for Men Foam, Clinically Proven Regrowth for Thinning Hair, Topical Hair Loss Treatment, Unscented Topical Aerosol, Results in 8–16 Weeks, 3-Month Supply, 3 x 2.11 oz
B0012BNVE8.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Hair Care > Hair Loss Products > Hair Regrowth Treatments
B0012BNVE8.description: Men’s Rogaine minoxidil for men foam is a clinically proven topical aerosol hair regrowth treatment featuring a 5% minoxidil formula to reactivate hair follicles and help regrow fuller, thicker hair. Designed for the early stages of thinning at the vertex (top of the scalp), this unscented minoxidil for men foam leverages Tricho-Prime Technology—a blend of botanical extracts, nourishing emollients, and alpha hydroxy acid (AHA)—to condition and gently exfoliate the scalp, help keep follicles open, and create an optimal environment for hair growth. Clinical studies show noticeable new hair regrowth in 12 weeks with consistent twice-daily use; individual timelines vary, and you may notice early signs between weeks 8–12 with fuller benefits around week 16. Because response can vary, you may experience initial shedding as weaker hairs make way for new growth; maintain consistent application to see the best results over time. To use, dispense approximately half a capful and apply directly to clean, dry thinning areas on the top of the scalp morning and night, gently massaging the product into the skin; allow it to dry completely before styling. The no-mess, quick-absorbing foam integrates seamlessly into daily routines and fits easily into your regular hair care regimen. Each pack provides a 3-month supply with three 2.11 oz bottles to support uninterrupted treatment and routine adherence. As a trusted hair loss treatment for men, this targeted foam penetrates the scalp to stimulate follicle activity and support hair protein production for visible regrowth with continued use. For best results, commit to consistent twice-daily application for at least 4 months to allow new growth to appear and mature; ongoing use is needed to maintain results. Rogaine is the #1 dermatologist-recommended hair growth product brand. If you’re ready to address hereditary hair loss at the vertex, choose the convenience of minoxidil for men foam and start your hair growth journey today.
features: Clinical hair regrowth: Clinically proven to improve hair regrowth by 4x versus control at 16 weeks; unscented topical aerosol foam, 3-month supply, apply half-capful twice daily on scalp to regrow fuller, thicker hair and reverse hereditary hair loss.

Scalp conditioning technology: Tricho-Prime technology with botanical extracts and emollients conditions scalp and keeps follicles open; alpha hydroxy acid (AHA) exfoliates gently to enhance minoxidil absorption and support hair growth products.

Targeted thinning hair treatment: Minoxidil for men foam stimulates hair follicle activity and boosts hair protein production; formulated for men with general thinning at the top of the scalp to promote fuller, denser hair regrowth.

Easy daily application: Unscented, no-mess foam fits seamlessly into your hair care and hair growth routine; this 5% minoxidil topical hair loss treatment applies in a half-capful twice daily on clean, dry scalp for a full 3-month supply.

Brand trust and efficacy: From the #1 dermatologist-recommended Rogaine, this 5% minoxidil foam for men is clinically proven to reverse hereditary hair loss and deliver visible regrowth; scientifically validated in clinical studies.

This combination will leave your hair feeling soft, nourished, and moisturized. Hair care for women and men. To use, apply the shampoo to wet hair and scalp, massage into a rich lather, and rinse thoroughly. Follow with the conditioner for best results. Avoid direct contact with eyes, and if contact occurs, rinse thoroughly with water. Experience the difference with CeraVe Gentle Hydrating Shampoo, where science meets care, providing you with a gentle yet effective solution for maintaining healthy looking, beautiful hair. *In a consumer test, after one use of gentle hydrating shampoo + conditioner **system vs. non-conditioning shampoo

M3 Extra Strength Cleaning Tablets are laboratory tested working to restore clarity by removing unwanted odor and buildup in every corner of any oral dental appliance and denture bath.*
120 Tablets of Optimal Results: Our individually wrapped cleaning denture bath tablets provide the most complete cleansing solution on the market. Restore clarity to any dental appliance by removing discoloration, stains, plaque, stubborn odors, and tartar! *
All Dental Appliances: Our tablets are perfect for denture baths, retainers, aligners, Invisalign, mouth guards, night guards, snore guards, sport, TMJ devices and all other removable dental appliances! *
Easy to Use: Just drop one tablet into warm tap water along with your dental bath appliance and let our extra strength cleanser do the rest! Quickly restore any dental appliance in just minutes! * Soaking Daily in a denture cup or ultrasonic retainer cleaner is highly recommended and will provide you with the best results by preventing food particle, cloudy film, and plaque buildup. *
M3 is a brand that contains products that contain natural ingredients and other ingredients. However, all M3 items are quality tested in the USA with the highest standards.

B000QXH4PK.description:
Experience instant fresh breath and oral care with Listerine Cool Mint PocketPaks breath strips, the portable solution designed to kill 99% of bad breath germs. These sugar free and kosher breath strips dissolve instantly on your tongue, releasing a Cool Mint flavor that leaves your mouth clean* *based on bad breath germs and confident. Each travel size personal care product includes 3 packs of 24 breath strips (72 strips total) in compact cases measuring 3.64 x 0.74 x 5.5 inches and weighing just 0.64 ounces, making them an ideal purse essential for on-the-go freshness at work, after coffee, before meetings, or anytime you need quick bad breath treatment for adults. 
 
 Key Benefits: 
 Listerine PocketPaks breath strips are a convenient alternative to breath mints, breath spray, or travel size mouthwash, offering discreet, no-chew, no-rinse oral freshness wherever you are. The compact carrying case keeps each strip ready for use, ensuring you can easily slip a pack into your purse, pocket, or bag for daily routines, travel, or special occasions. 
 
 How to use: 
 To use, simply remove one strip from the case, place it on your tongue, and let it dissolve for fast Cool Mint freshness. Designed for adults seeking effective bad breath treatment, these dissolving strips provide a portable, easy-to-carry option for maintaining fresh breath and oral care throughout the day. Whether you need a quick refresh after meals, before important meetings, or while traveling, Listerine Cool Mint PocketPaks breath strips deliver bad breath germ-killing performance and a burst of minty flavor in a discreet, travel-friendly format. 
 
 Chose listerine breath strips and oral care for fresh breath anytime, anywhere.

B003K01BMI.product_name: DenTek Advanced Clean Floss Picks with No Break & No Shred Dental Floss, Plaque Remover, 150 Count
B003K01BMI.breadcrumb: Health & Household > Oral Care > Dental Floss & Picks > Floss Picks
B003K01BMI.description: DenTek Triple Clean Advanced Clean Floss Picks have our thinnest, strongest floss that won't break or shred. The floss on DenTek Triple Clean Advanced Clean Floss Picks is composed of over 200 individual cleaning strands. The micro-textured pick helps to scrape away stubborn bits of food and plaque, and the tongue cleaner helps to fight bad breath. DenTek Triple Clean Advanced Clean Floss Picks feature Mouthwash blast flavored floss with fluoride-infused floss strands. While your teeth may feel clean after using a toothbrush and toothpaste, they're not fully clean without cleaning the spaces between teeth where food and plaque tend to remain. Use DenTek Triple Clean Advanced Clean Floss Picks to remove plaque and bits of food that often stay stuck between your teeth. Help prevent tooth decay and tooth stains by flossing after every meal. DenTek Triple Clean Advanced Clean Floss Picks come with a floss no-break assurance – DenTek assures the floss on DenTek Triple Clean Advanced Clean Floss Picks will not break with normal use or your money back*. DenTek Floss Picks are the first floss pick to be accepted by the ADA. Go beyond brushing with DenTek! We have an unparalleled array of advanced dental technology to help preserve and protect your teeth for a lifetime. *Proof of purchase required.

B0C9JDT1BZ.product_name: Heat Cap for Deep Conditioning: 10-Level Heats Up Quickly 3 Time Settings Hair Steamer for Natural Hair Home Use Thermal Steam Cap for Black Hair Portable Heating Caps
B0C9JDT1BZ.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Hair Care > Styling Tools & Appliances > Drying Hoods
B0C9JDT1BZ.description:
Salon-Quality Results at Home:Our High-Performance Hair Steamer Cap combines flame-retardant material with precise electronic temperature control, giving you professional deep conditioning without leaving your bathroom. Look and feel great while boosting your hair treatment—this heated cap takes your routine to the next level.
Upgraded for Thick, Curly Hair:Our hair steamer for deep conditioning Wider and longer than standard caps, it’s designed to fit thick, curly, or natural hair perfectly. The durable plastic lining (with a balanced double layer) maintains steady heat, while the adjustable cord strap fits any head size. Plus, it’s easy to clean—no hassle, just results.
Safe, Customizable Heat:This deep conditioning hair cap Choose from 10 temperature settings to match your comfort, and 3 timer modes (20-45 minutes) for optimal use. Our smart safety feature kicks in at 65°C (149°F)—it shuts off automatically, then restarts heating when temps drop to 45°C (113°F). Peace of mind, every time.
Deep Conditioning That Works:Prevent breakage and split ends with gentle, consistent heat that opens hair cuticles, helping your conditioner and treatments absorb deeper. The result? Softer, shinier hair that feels healthier from root to tip—ideal for all hair types.
Perfect for Home & Travel:Wide and deep enough to cover roots, ends, and edges, this compact cap fits easily in small spaces at home. Lightweight and portable, it’s also a travel essential—never skip your deep conditioning routine, even on the go.

Deep Conditioning That Works:Prevent breakage and split ends with gentle, consistent heat that opens hair cuticles, helping your conditioner and treatments absorb deeper. The result? Softer, shinier hair that feels healthier from root to tip—ideal for all hair types.

Perfect for Home & Travel:Wide and deep enough to cover roots, ends, and edges, this compact cap fits easily in small spaces at home. Lightweight and portable, it’s also a travel essential—never skip your deep conditioning routine, even on the go.
After-Sales Support: Have questions? Reach out directly—we’re here to solve any issues fast.

B0CLWVH384.product_name: Philips Norelco Shaver 2400 Series, Wet and Dry Electric Shaver, Pop-up Trimmer, P-Cap, Deep Black, Model X3001/90

B0CLWVH384.description:
Trust the #1 Electric shaver brand¹ and choose Philips Norelco Shaver 22400 Series: wet and dry electric shaver that gives you a fast, clean shave, even on sensitive skin.
 
 Its 27 self-sharpening ComfortCut Blades have a 2-year lifetime which makes your shaver perform like new every day. They cut each hair right above skin level for a smooth finish, while the 4D Pivot & Flex Heads follow your facial contour, protecting it from nicks and cuts. The blades are made from hypoallergenic steel to resist corrosion, prevent impurities, and protect your skin. 
 
 Shave wet or dry and take care of defining your mustache or sideburns with the pop-up trimmer. Clean the device at the touch of a button with one-touch open to easily rinse under the tap. 
 
 A durable NiMH battery provides 40 minutes of shaving time on a single 1-hour charge. A 5-minute quick charge gives you enough power for one shave when in a hurry. Charge with a USB-A charging cable (power adapter not included). 
 
 ¹ Source: Euromonitor International Limited, retail value RSP, per body shavers category definition, 2022 data, research conducted in December 202

B07CZCQ481.product_name: Amazon Basics 5-Blade MotionSphere Men's Razor with Dual Lubrication and Precision Trimmer, 17 Piece Set, 1 Handle & 16 Cartridges, Black
B07CZCQ481.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Shave & Hair Removal > Men's > Razors & Blades > Cartridge Razors
B07CZCQ481.description: Amazon Basics 5-Blade MotionSphere Razor for Men features a multi pivot design to follow the contours of your face and a beard trimmer for shaving goatee, sideburns and under nose. The razor cartridge is hypoallergenic, includes a lubricating strip with vitamin E, and has an anti-clog design for quick rinse. To load refill cartridge, push razor handle into a cartridge as it sits in the dispenser until it clicks. Cartridges fit Amazon Basics Razor Handles only; does not fit other brands. INSTRUCTIONS: 1. Prepare: Wash your face with warm water to remove dirt and oils. Apply a pre-shave oil (optional). 2. Lather: Apply shaving cream or gel to your face using a brush or directly with your hands. 3. Shave: Use a razor to shave in the direction of hair growth, using short and light strokes, rinsing the razor frequently. For a closer shave, you can reapply shaving cream/gel and shave against the grain (opposite direction of hair growth). However, be cautious as this may increase the risk of skin irritation or ingrown hairs. 4. Soothe: Rinse your face, pat dry, and apply an aftershave lotion or balm to moisturize and soothe the skin. 5. Store: Shake off excess water after use and store your razor in a clean, dry place.
features: 5-blade MotionSphere razor handle and 16 refill cartridges
Hypoallergenic lubricating strips with Vitamin E to help reduce skin irritation
Anti-clog design for quick rinse
Beard trimmer for shaving goatee, sideburns, and under nose
Cartridges fit Amazon Basics Razor Handles only; does not fit other brands
MotionSphere multi axis pivot follows the contours of the face

B08TM8DLFJ.product_name: Good Molecules Hyaluronic Acid Serum - 1% Hyaluronic Acid Non-greasy Ultra Hydrating Serum, Facial Moisturizer for Plumper Skin, Skin Care for Face

B08TM8DLFJ.description:
DEEP, LONG LASTING HYDRATION: Experience the moisturizing power of Hyaluronic Acid! Embrace newfound confidence with the Good Molecules Hyaluronic Acid Serum made with powerful ingredients to help your skin maintain its radiant glow!
PLUMP, FIRM, AND MOISTURIZE: Notice the difference in your skin! This serum works to restore moisture, bringing out the best in your skin. The lightweight serum helps your skin to appear supple, smooth, and firm.
POTENT FORMULA FOR RADIANT SKIN: Our serum contains two forms of hyaluronic acid with different molecular weights, allowing it to penetrate multiple layers of the skin and combat dehydration, and loss of firmness.
PERFECT ADDITION TO YOUR BEAUTY REGIMEN: Apply a few drops in the morning and at night before oils, creams, and moisturizers. For best results, apply to damp skin. Let absorb for 30 seconds before continuing with your routine. Every Good Molecules product is marked with a Period After Opening date, please find on the back label.
GENTLE ENOUGH FOR ALL SKIN TYPES: Powerful enough to bring results and gentle enough for daily use; this serum is suitable for all skin types. Our serum has a pH of 5.8 and is vegan, gluten-free, fragrance-free, and cruelty-free.

B077TWXCQV.product_name: CeraVe Body Wash with Salicylic Acid, Fragrance Free Body Wash to Exfoliate Rough and Bumpy Skin, Allergy Tested, 10 Ounce
B077TWXCQV.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Skin Care > Body > Cleansers > Body Washes
B077TWXCQV.description:
[ EXFOLIATING BODY WASH ] Salicylic Acid (SA) is a beta hydroxy acid (BHA), an exfoliator that removes dead skin cells and smooths skin. It acts as a chemical exfoliant, which feels less harsh than physical ones like exfoliating body scrubs.
[ HYDRATING & SMOOTHING ] Salicylic Acid helps exfoliate rough skin and bumps that can appear on the upper arms and legs, leaving a softer, smoother look and feel. Contains Hyaluronic Acid to help retain skin's moisture and Niacinamide to help calm skin.
[ SALICYLIC ACID SKIN CARE ] Massage CeraVe Salicylic Acid Body Wash into skin in gentle, circular motions with a washcloth or shower loofah. Can be paired with CeraVe Salicylic Acid Moisturizing Cream for Rough and Bumpy Skin to moisturize & exfoliate.
[ 3 ESSENTIAL CERAMIDES ] Ceramides are found naturally in the skin and make up 50% of the lipids in the skin barrier. All CeraVe products are formulated with three essential ceramides (1, 3, 6-II) to help restore and maintain the skin’s natural barrier.
[ DEVELOPED WITH DERMATOLOGISTS ] CeraVe Skincare is developed with dermatologists and has products suitable for dry skin, sensitive skin, oily skin, acne-prone, and more. Fragrance free, paraben-free, allergy-tested, and non-comedogenic

B0CHXDKRR6.product_name: Plexaderm Rapid Reduction Eye Serum - Visibly Reduces Under-Eye Bags, Wrinkles, Dark Circles, Fine Lines & Crow's Feet Instantly, Anti Aging Wrinkle Remover for Face, Full Size Tube
B0CHXDKRR6.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Skin Care > Eyes > Serums
B0CHXDKRR6.description:
ANTI-AGING ADVANCED SKIN CARE – Plexaderm Rapid Reduction Serum harnesses the power of silicate minerals derived from shale clay to create a temporary skin tightening layer on your skin that lifts, tightens and smooths the skin for a more youthful appearance.
SMOOTHER THAN EVER – Our anti-wrinkle face serum was formulated for maximum spreadability and even application. Once dry, it has a smooth feel and a satin finish, leaving you with a natural youthful glow.
AT HOME INSTANT FACE LIFT – Our clinically tested rapid wrinkle repair formula gives instant results in as little as 10 minutes and leaves you looking years younger. Get immediate results without turning to expensive cosmetic treatments that can be painful and time consuming!
10 HOURS OF ONGOING BEAUTY – Our advanced skin serum was clinically tested and shows that results can last for up to 10 hours. Apply to clean and dry skin. Allow Plexaderm Rapid Reduction Serum to set and dry for 10 minutes after application. As it sets, avoid moving the areas where you’ve applied Plexaderm so that you can achieve optimal results.
PERFECT FOR ALL – Plexaderm goes on clear so nobody will know you are using it and it is easy to apply! This anti-aging serum has both men and women nationwide happy with their youthful-looking skin and younger appearance.

B0859QS3YC.product_name: Good Molecules Caffeine Energizing Hydrogel Eye Patches - Eye Mask with Hyaluronic Acid Hydrate and Reduce Puffiness - Pack of 30, Skincare for Face

B0859QS3YC.description:
ENERGIZE TIRED EYES: Our nutrient-packed, mega-energizing eye patches can work wonders on tired eyes, giving you a bright, refreshed glow while helping to reduce puffiness and visibly minimize dark circles.
HYDRATE AND FIRM: Formulated with potent and clean ingredients to firm, hydrate, and brighten your skin. They will leave your skin moisturized and smooth and can even help reduce signs of aging.
EASY AND FUN TO USE: Perfect addition to your self-care regimen! Apply to clean, dry skin. Leave it on for 10-15 minutes. Gently remove and massage any remaining serum into the skin. Suitable for daily use.
NURTURING, POWERFUL INGREDIENTS: These hydrogel eye patches contain caffeine, hyaluronic acid, niacinamide, licorice extract, peptides, and aloe vera to brighten dark circles, plump the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, and deliver lasting hydration to the skin.
GENTLE ENOUGH FOR ALL SKIN TYPES: These eye patches are safe for all skin types, and can be used regularly. They are vegan, cruelty-free, and have balanced with a pH of 5.7. Each pack contains 30 sets, 60 individual patches, so you can pamper yourself or share with friends!

B07GQNKH65.product_name: Aloderma Organic Aloe Vera Gel for Face & Body, 96% Pure Aloe Gel Made within 12 Hours of Harvest, Ideal for Skin, Scalp, & Hair Hydration, Calming Moisturizer for Soothing After Sun Care, 7.05oz
B07GQNKH65.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Skin Care > Sunscreens & Tanning Products > After Sun
B07GQNKH65.description:
Made Within 12 Hours of Harvest: At Aloderma, our skincare is rooted in the earth. Our 100% Pure Organic Aloe Vera is grown on our organic farms, processed on-site and turned into final products within hours of leaving the fields to ensure that we capture the natural power of Aloe Vera in every product we make.
Aloderma: We are a family run organic farm-to-face skin care line focused on producing and creating high-quality 100% organic aloe vera-based products in an ecologically friendly way. Our farms and factory are certified USDA and European Union organic by ECOCERT and certified sustainable. Aloderma has over 20 years of working with Aloe providing high quality and affordable products for beauty, health and wellness.
Pure Aloe Vera Gel: Aloderma Pure Aloe Gel is made with 100% pure organic aloe and combined with hydrating ingredients to make a fast-acting moisturizer to restore skin's natural balance and hydration. It provides intense hydration for a plump and supple complexion. It’s lightweight and fast-absorbing and it’s suitable for all skin types.
Multifunctional: Our pure aloe vera gel will calm and cool your skin after sun exposure or just when it is need of a pick-me-up. Its natural and gentle formula soothes skin irritation and nourishes dry skin, scalps, and hair. It has cooling and calming properties to help reduce redness and provide support for your hair, skin and scalp regardless of season.
Radiant Beauty: Enhance your natural beauty with our nourishing gel, providing balance of hydration and radiance to your skin. Our nourishing and refreshing aloe gel helps maintain skin's natural balance and pH levels. It helps to reduce dryness and flaking, leaving skin feeling soft and supple.

It has cooling and calming properties to help reduce redness and provide support for your hair, skin and scalp regardless of season.

Radiant Beauty: Enhance your natural beauty with our nourishing gel, providing balance of hydration and radiance to your skin. Our nourishing and refreshing aloe gel helps maintain skin's natural balance and pH levels. It helps to reduce dryness and flaking, leaving skin feeling soft and supple.

B00Q23KER8.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Skin Care > Sunscreens & Tanning Products > Self-Tanners > Body Self-Tanners
B00Q23KER8.description:
FLAWLESS SELF TANNER - This dark self tanner creates a flawless, quick tan with instant, natural-looking color for gorgeous skin and blended color.
DEEP SUNLESS TANNING - Lightweight, airy tanning mousse enhances your natural, dark skin tone to mimic results from the sun.
NATURAL BODY BRONZER - Develop your tone instantly, and watch it deepen within hours of application for steak-free results. Use the next day for deeper color.
LIGHT, FRESH SCENT - Jergens Natural Glow Instant Sun Mousse will keep you feeling fresh with a light and fresh scent
EASY, FAST-DRYING APPLICATION - Applied by hand or sunless tanning mitt, our self tanning mousse is tinted for precise application, and it dries in just 60 seconds.
